page.title: 01 INTRODUCTORY PAGE
page.content: Our square is on the North East outskirts of Dundee,and consists of residential areas and farmland.The housing areas are the edges of 3 or 4 housing estates,a mixture of private and council housing.There are also 3 industrial estates on the edge of the city ,with new factories and industries springing up all the time.In the farming areas there are 4 large estate houses,in varying states of repair and it is today's farmland.Two of these estate houses are in ruins.Another,Pitkerro House has been extremely well maintained with a trust formed to look after the estate's interests. S
